```{r setup, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
source("setup_knitr.R")
## library(ggplot2)
## library(tidyverse)
## library(viridis)
smf <- function(x) 
  sum(sort(x, decreasing = TRUE)[1:5], na.rm=TRUE)/5
mpf <- function(x) 
  sum(sort(x, decreasing = TRUE)[1:2], na.rm=TRUE)/2
decf <- function(x) 
  ifelse(x<39, 'Reprovado', 
         ifelse(x>69, 'Aprovado', 'Final'))
```
